Interface QuizService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuizServer

    public interface QuizService
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A class to serve multiple and concurrent quiz creaters and players

    • Method Summary
